name: Pixel Ninja (bryengx)
description:
Legend has it there is a huge block of gold at the top!

You are a ninja. You must jump to the top of the tower and claim all of its treasure!

Game mostly features wall jumping. But there is a restriction - wall jump against one wall can be done only once unless followed by wall jump against other wall or you land on the ground!

Best time can be submited online. for this I used Lootlocker.

There are a few shortcuts that are not that obvious at first!

Music made by Dylan Seibert (@nevereven_real)

Sound effects come form Gamemaster Audio - Pro Sound Collection v1.3
